          <title>
            <string language="en">Copper pipes in heating systems</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kupferne Rohre in den Heizsystemen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pipes de cuivre dans des systèmes de chauffage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tubulações de cobre em sistemas de heating</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tubi di rame nei sistemi di riscaldamento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σωλήνες χαλκού στα συστήματα θέρμανσης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tubos de cobre en sistemas de calefacción</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The figure shows two short pieces of copper pipes with different diameters used in a household's hot water delivery system.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">diameter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heat loss</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heating system</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hot water</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">thickness</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Abbildung zeigt zwei kurze Stücke kupferne 
Rohre mit den unterschiedlichen Durchmessern, die im 
Heißwasser-Anlieferung System eines Haushalts benutzt werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La figure montre deux morceaux courts de pipes de
cuivre avec différents diamètres utilisés dans le système de la 
livraison de l'eau chaude d'un ménage.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A figura mostra duas partes curtas das 
tubulações de cobre com os diâmetros diferentes usados no sistema 
da entrega da água quente de uma casa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La figura mostra due parti corte dei tubi di rame
con differenti diametri usati nel sistema di consegna dell'acqua calda
della famiglia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο αριθμός εμφανίζει δύο σύντομα κομμάτια των σωλήνων
χαλκού με τις διαφορετικές διαμέτρους που χρησιμοποιούνται στο 
σύστημα παράδοσης καυτού ύδατος μιας οικογένειας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La figura muestra dos pedazos cortos de los tubos
de cobre con diversos diámetros usados en el sistema de la salida de 
la agua caliente de una casa.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Durchmesser</string>
          </keyword>
